benchmark_details.name: IADGPT: Unified LVLM for Few-Shot Industrial Anomaly Detection, Localization, and Reasoning via In-Context Learning
benchmark_details.overview: We present a new dataset comprising 100K images across 400 diverse industrial product categories with extensive attribute-level textual annotations, and we propose a unified framework, IADGPT, for performing few-shot industrial anomaly detection in a human-like manner.

purpose_and_intended_users.goal: To develop a unified LVLM that can perform few-shot industrial anomaly detection, localization, and reasoning efficiently across diverse product categories.

data.source: A dataset comprising 100K images across 400 diverse industrial product categories with extensive attribute-level textual annotations.
data.annotation: Generated descriptions for each image from different perspectives using a vision-language model.

metrics: Area Under the Receiver Operating Characteristic (AUC)
methodology.calculation: Metrics are calculated based on the model's prediction confidence on the images.
methodology.interpretation: Higher AUC indicates better performance in anomaly detection and localization tasks.
methodology.validation: The dataset was constructed and validated to ensure diversity and extensive annotation.
